definition: expressing yourself readily, clearly, effectively, silverware eating utensils, turn silver
details:
adjective
- expressing yourself readily, clearly, effectively
= synonyms: eloquent
- having the white lustrous sheen of silver
= example: having the white lustrous sheen of silver
= synonyms: silvern, silvery
- of lustrous grey
= example: of lustrous grey
= synonyms: silvery, argent, silverish
- made from or largely consisting of silver
= example: made from or largely consisting of silver
noun
- silverware eating utensils
= synonyms: flatware
- a trophy made of silver (or having the appearance of silver) that is usually awarded for winning second place in a competition
= synonyms: silver medal
- a light shade of grey
= synonyms: ash grey, ash gray, silver grey, silver gray
- coins made of silver
- a soft white precious univalent metallic element having the highest electrical and thermal conductivity of any metal
verb
- turn silver
= example: turn silver
- make silver in color
= example: make silver in color
- coat with a layer of silver or a silver amalgam
= example: coat with a layer of silver or a silver amalgam
